alert.note: Alert for Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 27 at 10:56PM EDT until September 27 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL HOPKINS AND CENTRAL WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 953 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dixon to 6 miles south of Sebree, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Hanson, and Slaughters. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 122 and 133. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
